name: Zero-Sum
description:
Hello, this is a bullet hell/rogue-like game where you will try to beat 7 levels. 

I want to give a big thanks to the people who made the music, because not only could  I not make music to save my life, but their music really enhanced the experience.

Music Used

Main Menu

Mysterious

by nene

Stage-1

Battle Theme B for RPG 

by cynicmusic

Stage-2

Battle Theme A for RPG 

by cynicmusic

Stage-3

Vilified

By Matthew Pablo

Stage-4

Battle RPG Theme

Music by Cleyton Kauffman - https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman

Stage-5

Boss Battle #2 [Symphonic Metal]

by nene

Stage-6

Boss Battle #6 Metal

by nene

Stage-7

Countdown

by Alexandr Zhelanov - https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Death Screen

Death is just another path

by Otto Halmén
